DOC.brief_title: Remotely-Delivered Benefits Counseling Service Connection Applicants
DOC.detailed_description: Current application rate suggest half Operation Enduring Freedom/Operation Iraqi Freedom ( OEF/OIF ) Veterans eventually apply form service-connection , approximately 100,000 Veterans per year evaluate psychiatric condition . Veterans apply service-connection psychiatric condition distress , often occupational difficulty , unaddressed typical Compensation Pension evaluation . Counseling addresses beneficiary ' concern lose compensation payment work pay , supplement vocational support , associate increased employment among people disable chronic psychiatric condition . This group develop online Benefits Counseling intervention tailor help Veterans apply service-connection engage work-related activity . The investigator demonstrate efficacy face-to-face version Benefits Counseling complete Rehabilitation Research & Development-funded six-month clinical trial Veterans assign Benefits Counseling work significantly day control , ( p < .05 , effect size = 0.69 ) , reflect average three day employment six month follow-up . The investigator use supplement Rehabilitation Research & Development develop web-based version counseling , counsel could deliver without counselor on-site . The web-based intervention modify base user feedback , extent use Veterans home impact behavior unknown . In proposed clinical trial , Veterans work two few day per week present Compensation & Pension examination psychiatric disorder assess baseline urge log afterwards website random assignment either Remotely-Delivered Benefits Counseling ( n=65 ) Veterans Benefits Administration web site ( n=65 ) , assess 4 , 12 , 24 week randomization order calculate standardize group mean difference slopes time . The primary outcome measure treatment-by-time slope hour pay work . Exploratory analysis estimate association potential mediator treatment response outcome . The propose study provide estimate efficacy remotely-delivered Benefits Counseling initiated Compensation Pension examination , widely-used point contact VA .
